ATI02.primary:
Bare stage with no wings
Lighting used colours and moving lights in ways not commonly used for ballet
Video projected in between pieces
Used modern moving lights with very few conventional lights

ACSI06.primary:
4 new works created by Canadian choreographers and designers
Platform was given to 4 female Canadian choreographers to interpret historical work in their voice. 
Innovative set design
Innovative lighting design
Original costumes designed and created
